name: Parasite Star
description:
(EARLY BUILD, EXPECT PLACEHOLDERS AND SOME BUGS)

Everything around the house seems to have completely changed over the span of one night, nothing seems to make sense anymore, the only options are staying home and finding a purpose in this strange new world.

Discover surreal places, interact with your less than qualified companions, and fight indescribable horrors. 

Parasite Star has been a personal passion project of mine that I've been developing on and off since around late 2019 and recently started pushing it harder towards the end. However, it's still very early in development with play times averaging 30-45 minutes. Some parts are still unfinished, but I feel that it's at a good enough point to show the public that it can become something.

This game is heavily inspired by surreal horror games such as Yume Nikki and its fan-games like .flow and Yume 2kki. I highly recommend that any fan of those gives this a try!

There is no definitive end to this version, the goal is mainly to see if you can find all the content. Also, If you want to discuss the game, help me squish bugs, or just want a place to hang out then join my Discord server! discord.gg/n3pFAGcMfh Or if you prefer twitter, follow https://twitter.com/dingasu

CONTROLS: 

LEFT/RIGHT = MOVE
Z = ATTACK, INTERACT/USE
HOLD Z = CHARGE ATTACK
X = DASH, CANCEL
A = PARRY
C/ESC = INVENTORY
UP = PLACE IN INVENTORY, WARP, INTERACT
DOWN = PICK UP ITEM,PUT DOWN ITEM
R = RESTART GAME

Gamepad works too!
